currentIssues.description: Text contrast fails WCAG AA standards - gray text on dark background appears to be around 2.5:1 ratio
No visible focus indicators on interactive elements
Chord progressions (orange text) compete visually with lyrics, creating unclear hierarchy
Inconsistent text sizing and unclear hierarchy between chords and lyrics
Inconsistent vertical spacing between chord lines and lyric lines
Interactive elements (buttons) have unclear boundaries and no hover states

recommendations.title: Improve text contrast
recommendations.description: Change gray lyrics text to #E5E7EB for 7:1 contrast ratio on dark background

recommendations.title: Add ARIA labels
recommendations.description: Add screen reader labels to icon buttons

recommendations.title: Add focus indicators
recommendations.description: Add visible focus rings to all interactive elements for keyboard navigation

recommendations.title: Enhance button design
recommendations.description: Add proper button styling with hover states and clear boundaries
recommendations.code: className='p-2 rounded-lg bg-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-700 transition-colors duration-200 border border-gray-700'

recommendations.title: Differentiate chord styling
recommendations.description: Make chords smaller and position above lyrics with consistent spacing
recommendations.code:
className='text-sm text-orange-400 mb-1 font-mono' // for chords
className='text-lg text-gray-200 mb-6' // for lyrics

recommendations.title: Implement consistent spacing system
recommendations.description: Use 8px grid system for all spacing to create visual rhythm
recommendations.code:
className='space-y-8' // between verse blocks
className='space-y-2' // between chord/lyric pairs
